headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Free Gift for Playing Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy – The Definitive Edition
content: To qualify for the iconic Liberty City Penitentiary Coveralls, play any title from Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy – The Definitive Edition then log in to play GTA Online any time before November 25. The coveralls will be added to your wardrobe within 72 hours of logging in after December 2. Players must have previously connected all titles to their Social Club account to qualify.
